title: I feel like my account has been hijacked
body: Hi, I had to create a new account to just make this forum post. It has been a while since I last played the game, but when i went to log into the game, none of my information worked. I am now freaking out, because my password will not work, any support email I try to have sent to me will not show up, and I cannot get any reply from my support ticket, to even check it it needed me to sign in. I have so much on my account, and I will be devastated if I lose it. My friend checked me on his friends list, and the last game played was the one by me back in August, and I do not have my credit card saved to the game, so what would someone get from having my account? Please help, I am really desperate!

replies.body:
you should go ahead and use this account that you have made to submit a ticket since now you should have an email that you can receive notifications on when they reply.

as for what someone could get from your account:
-any potential RP to gift themselves skins
-the use of a throw-away account that they can get in trouble wish and not care
-attempt to sell the account for money
-try to trick anyone on your friend list into a fake/scam website and then steal THEIR accounts to do any of the listed things, including scam more accounts with this same method.
Yikes, some people out there, you know? Just hope this can be fixed before it's too late.

Since you've already submitted a ticket, I recommend sitting tight while we get back to you. We're pretty overloaded with tickets at the moment, so there may be a bit of a delay, but I promise we aren't forgetting about you.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks a lot, I was just getting worried that I had not heard anything in a while. This is my temporary smurf account I'm using to play while I wait. Is it normal to not hear anything in three days though?
